title: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:
Hi again [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] .

I know it has been a long time since my last visit, but I thought I would contribute to this fantastic community with my keen mod.

No, it's not finished, and will pobably never be... at least not by me. If anyone wants to edit or complete it, feel free to do so [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] .

Unfortunately, I never got the time to finish it myself. It is different from the demo i released (1 year ago :S) and features more levels, which I have put A LOT of work into... maybe too much [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] .

All the secrets within the levels are revealed, and marked with special tiles. I used them while editing.

The .rar also include pre.bmp & end.bmp which I never implemented in the game. There should also be a working version of various modding/editing tools I haven't deleted :S. Also a lot of other files which ain't used.

I present you; ALIEN VS KEEN 0.01:
[url=http://www.savefile.com/files/9162261]AvK[/url]

Enjoy.-------------------------------
If something's HARD to do, then it's NOT worth doing. -Homer J. Simpson

title: Re: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:
It's been a year already?! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

Hey, cool! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I've been waiting for this mod, too bad this isn't the complete version.. I wish you could complete it sometime..

Anyways, I'll play it now -- I'm expecting something cool! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:
Yeah..

Gotta say, this mod is some serious garg! It's awesome!! The sprites and tiles and levels, everything's pretty cool.

Haven't yet finished it. This mod makes me paranoid! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stoned.gif[/img] It's scary, one never knows when some alien attacks or crawls in the ventilation system.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:

If something's HARD to do, then it's NOT worth doing. -Homer J. Simpson

title: Re: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:
Too bad level 3 seems to be impossible.. Player can never find the green card. Player can almost get to the room the green card is located, but can't because one solid tile is blocking the way. Perhaps the solid tile should be gray foreground tile instead, but in accident there is placed wrong tile. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

It has already made me paranoid! Gaaarg!Eat your veggies!

title: well...
content: Thanks for contributing this--I really liked your environments and the way you made the levels "believable."  Kudos and good luck in your future projects.  :-)

title: Re: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:
God I hate this kind of websites, I'll let you know if I succeed downloading this.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/fr/Froggy_Check.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.com/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img]

title: Re: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:
Succeeded.

Well it's great, but we've already seen most of your stuff. The alien itself is probably the best thing in it.
I am a little bit dissapointed thought that there aren't much alien eggs in it, and that the facehuggers don't kill Keen (I said this before).
Also I didn't recognise the worm thing and those plants that can kill you.


Still I sound more negative then I really am, it's a pity you are not going to finish this.

And thanks LL I feel a lot safer now I know that you're going to touch this mod.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/sn/Snow_Ball.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.com/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: Aliens Versus Keen 0.01
content:
Hmmm, the worm thing is chestburster in this mod, I assume.
[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/7/70/Chestburster.jpg[/img]

The plant -- no idea. Most likely it's just something dangerous that lives on that planet.

About continuing this -- I'd like to try my hand at some Alien stuff too. Perhaps after the current mod.. Well, I guess everyone are free to try.Eat your veggies!
